Variable.Name: RXDCOUNT
Variable.Description: The number of prescription medicines reported

Variable.Name: RXDDAYS
Variable.Description: For how long have you been using or taking {PRODUCT NAME}?

Variable.Name: RXDUSE
Variable.Description: In the past 30 days, have you used or taken medication for which a prescription is needed?  Do not include prescription vitamins

Variable.Name: RXQSEEN
Variable.Description: Was prescription container seen by interviewer?
